cards.title: Google tests an AI productivity agent that lives in your inbox
cards.tagline: Streamline PMO tasks with Google's AI productivity agent in your inbox.
tldr: This tool addresses PMO pain points by automating daily task management and updates, reducing decision fatigue.
Key features include daily briefings, email drafting, and action suggestions, enhancing productivity through integration with Google services.
To implement, start by testing the CC tool in your inbox and customize its settings for your workflow.
Use cases include streamlining project updates, coordinating team tasks, and managing schedules effectively within PMO environments.
